meanings.definition: A person who complains or expresses dissatisfaction.
meanings.sent1: The griper in our group always finds something to complain about.
meanings.sent2: My sister can be a griper when things don't go her way.
meanings.sent3: The griper at the restaurant sent back his food three times!
meanings.sent4: She was a real griper, always seeing the negative side of things.
meanings.sent5: The griper's constant complaints made everyone feel unhappy.

meanings.definition: A device or tool used for gripping or holding onto something tightly.
meanings.sent1: The rock climber's griper helped him hold on to the cliff.
meanings.sent2: I need a griper to tighten this bolt securely.
meanings.sent3: The griper on the handle made it easier to carry the heavy load.
meanings.sent4: His strong griper on the steering wheel kept the car steady.
meanings.sent5: The griper on the jar lid made it easier to open.
